attributes.action: UK to vote on whether we wish to remain in union with Scotland
attributes.additional_details:
The overwhelming success of the SNP in the 2015 General election.
The ratio of Scottish votes to remain in the EU
The volume of hate and vitriol from our neighbours  in the north
William Wallace
The battle of Bannockburn https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Battle_of_Bannockburn
attributes.background:
PM Theresa May will be entering into Brexit negotiations with Nicola Sturgeon hanging around her leg like an anchor.
The time has come for the UK to vote on whether we wish to remain in union with Scotland.
